A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie I’ve ever seen. I’m going to make this review short and simple\, this has been made into something that just doesn’t feel like Star Wars\, they transformed Luke into a different character\, got rid off smoke just like that\, failed to deliver on a good answer to who Rey’s parents are\, etc. I literally think the force awakens and even the phantom menace are a million times better than this piece of crap labeled as a Star Wars film.
